TEXT.TITLE: PIONEER SYSTEMS INC <PAE> YEAR NOV 29 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss five cts vs loss 1.28 dlrs Oper net loss 155,000 vs loss 3,982,000 Sales 37.1 mln vs 34.2 mln NOTE: Net excludes losses from discontinued fabric finishing operations of 3,431,000 dlrs vs 5,910,000 dlrs. Reuter
